Question: SOULX Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SOULX Co., Ltd.

Product: XRoom Pro

- XRoom Pro is a Real-Time XR-Based Content Creation Software Solution
- Utilizes game engine-based real-time video synthesis technology and 3D asset source synthesis functions
- Enables non-professionals, amateurs, and regular people to easily create high-quality video content
- Reduces the average production time of high-quality video content by 45% and production costs by an average of 70%
- Optimized for short-form media, enabling easy and effective visual storytelling
- Aims to showcase the solution's excellence and potential usability externally through collaborations with global creators, virtual influencers, and others
- Plans to reveal the beta version of VRoom (VRoom 0.7.1) at CES 2023
- Preparing to build a P2P open market platform that provides copyright-free assets and NFT-based assets for creators
Summary_cn:
SOULX有限公司。

产品：XRoom Pro

- XRoom Pro是基于实时XR的内容创作软件解决方案
- 利用游戏引擎为基础的实时视频合成技术和3D资产来源合成功能
- 让非专业人士、业余爱好者和普通人能够轻松创建高质量的视频内容
- 平均减少高质量视频内容的生产时间45％，生产成本平均减少70％
- 优化为短形式媒体，实现简单而有效的视觉叙事
- 通过与全球创作者、虚拟网络红人等的合作，旨在展示该解决方案的卓越性和潜在可用性
- 计划在2023年国际消费电子展（CES）上发布VRoom（VRoom 0.7.1）的测试版本
- 准备建立一个P2P开放市场平台，为创作者提供无版权资产和基于NFT的资产
